bugsterCli.description: Bugster CLI installed and available in PATH

apiKey.description: Bugster API key configured in ~/.bugsterrc file

setupInstructions: 3. Check if ~/.bugsterrc exists and contains a valid apiKey field
4. If ~/.bugsterrc is missing or apiKey is not configured:
- Ask user to provide their Bugster API key (available at https://bugster.dev)
5. Check if .bugster directory exists in project root
6. If .bugster does not exist, collect from user:
- Login credentials if login page exists (username and password)
7. Update this setup.json file: set 'installed' to true, 'configured' to true, and 'setupComplete' to true
verifySetup: Run 'bugster --version' from any directory to verify installation. Check ~/.bugsterrc exists with valid apiKey. Check .bugster directory exists in project root.
